Detailed Description

cvmx_cpri::_map_smpl_cfg_rx

This register configures AxC sample with used for the reciever AxC mapping.

To read the current sample width for an AxC, first write this register with [AXC] set to the desired AxC, and [CFG] cleared to zero. Then read back the [WIDTH] value.
